name: Intruder Alert (pikachurian)
description:
Rat out the spy on your ship. 

Controls:

f4 = toggle fullscreen

w,a,s,d = move

e = interact

When you press E near certain people and objects you will be taken to the chat screen.  When you are at the chat screen, type commands to question your suspect.  Some commands might make your suspect happier or angrier.  Their mood is track by the face icon on the upper left corner of the screen.

Type your command and press enter to submit it.  Click the icon on the bottom of the screen, farthest to the left, to go to the main chat window.  Click the icon with a question mark "?" to see the list of commands.  The commands are not case sensitive.  Click the door icon on the bottom right to leave the chat screen.

This game is a work in progress.
